title: Permanent Vacancy Rates in Social Worker Positions and Agency Spend

content:
Dear Sheffield City Council,
I wish to make a FOI request for the below Information please
How many permanent vacancies do you have for qualified social workers across both children and adults services and this as a percentage would be useful
How many agency ' social worker' staff do you currently have for children and adults services and what percentage is this against your FTE roles
Lastly, If known do you know what was spent on agency social workers in 2024 again in both children and adults services
Reason for the request is to put together a cost analysis to show the significant cost savings against hiring from overseas to reduce agency staff due to the national shortage in the UK
Yours faithfully,
Daniel Halls

Dear Daniel Halls,
Thank you for your request for information relating to Permanent Vacancy
Rates in Social Worker Positions and Agency Spend which we received on
22/01/2025.
This has been logged as a Freedom of Information Request and will be dealt
with under the Freedom of Information Act 2000. The reference number for
your request can be found above.
The Freedom of Information Act 2000 states that we must respond to you
within 20 working days, by 19/02/2025. Please do not hesitate to contact
us at the email address below if you have any queries.
